alert.note: Alert for Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains; Salton Sea (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 1:46PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside County through 215 PM PDT... At 146 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chiriaco Summit, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Shore. This includes CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 74 and 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chiriaco Summit; Chuckwalla Mountains; Salton Sea
